评论详情: I needed a purple workout top to match some recently purchased leggings.  There were several brands on sale since it was Amazon Prime Day.  I chose these (a purple and a white) because of the plethora of positive reviews regarding quality, and the price was a bargain.  When I opened the package I noticed immediately that the purple was just as depicted as was the bright white, and both were quite attractive.  The fabric is lightweight, almost silky, airy, and soft to the touch.  The cut is perfect, the length is flattering (hitting me right at the top of the buttocks) and the construction is flawless making the top extremely flattering.  The armholes and neckline are not revealing but very becoming as is the overall shape of the top.  The breathability of the fabric and airflow helped with cooling during a high intensity workout, and there was no evidence of profuse sweating. There was no twisting, pulling, or flapping as the workout progressed.  When I order workout attire I do so because of the colors, design, and cost. I read reviews and descriptions and try to discern durability and functionality. However, there is no real way to determine the latter. Once I make the decision, I order and hope for the best.  These two tops are "top notch" and did not disappoint.  I could not be more pleased with my purchase.Top 3 Likes:-Fabric is lightweight, silky, and very soft-Flattering design in the perfect purple color and handles a vigorous workout well-Cool, airy, and moisture wickingTop 3 Dislikes:-No dislikes!

I bought two, one in the teal and the other in the wine color.  Nice fabric that should be easy to wash and beautiful deep colors. They both fit great. Not baggy and not snug, but comfortable and complimentary and a nice fit under the arms. (a must for sleeveless tops for me). I am a runner so can see wearing these on cooler runs and summer picnics. But also think it could easily be worn under a blazer for a more professional look. There is a small reflection stripe on the back but it would not be noticeable if your blazer was on.  Love them.  May buy more.

评论概述: Very comfortable and love the style, but early pilling is very disappointing.
评论详情: Love: Fit, color, cut, material, breathability  Sad: Started pilling after the third delicate-cycle wash (delicate wash inside out, delicate dry, per instructions)  This is not typical of my experience with Baleaf. I have several other Baleaf items and hate to leave a less-than-stellar review, but it was very disappointing to find pilling on a $20 shirt so quickly.  It may have been a one-off issue with my shirt or maybe my expectations are off in terms of $, but especially in the absence of any other colors I like, it’s a bit pricy for me to “test out” another one.  As a side note, I would really appreciate other dark color options, such as burnt orange, deep yellow, dark red, navy, etc.
Fits true to size. Washes up very nice. I got the Navy color.. Nice dark color

I use this shirt for both running and gym. It checks all the boxes for me 1) Lightweight; 2) Good compromise of not too clingy and/or loose; 3) High neck to protect a bit from Florida sun; 4) Armholes are not too big or low. 5) Good length for me. 6) Price is right! I am an older fit woman, a bit over 5'7" and 160lbs and Large is a good fit.

评论概述: Nice workout tank top, not very long
评论详情: It's a nice enough tank top, but as a woman over 6 foot tall this is short. For me it's closer to a crop top than a standard top. I vehemently dislike crop tops on myself, so this is a no go for me (someone point me to longer tank tops, that'd be awesome).  It's good for workouts it's light and moisture wicking.

I love this short.  It fits perfectly and us well made.  No puckering.  Nice and smooth.  It's also 100% poly and fast drying, which is essential for outdoor activities where I live.I will be buying more!
love this top, breathable material and comfortable

I like a tank top that doesn't hang too low under arms and show fat spilling over a well fiitted (tight) sport bra.  This one might go a tad too far so it bunches at the shoulder on me  .  5'8 175 lbs

评论概述: Quality fabric, not just a work out top
评论详情: Bought for workouts however do wear casually. Great under blazer, cardigan, to golf in ride a bike in the back will cover your buttocks.

I usually wear small but ordered medium based on reviews. It fits perfectly especially with length & height of neckline without choking me or revealing too much in planking or downward dog positions. Thin, breathable but not see through. Washes well.  Got the aqua & black, probably will get others.
This is my second one, I bought it in two more colors. I like the shape for sun protection and it fits really nice.

I purchased this top in three colors and two were in original packaging.  The third one was in a different bag and had the tags removed/cut out already and smelled of perfume.  I'm keeping it and am happy with the tops, just disappointed in the company for trying to slip this by as new.  Trust is important to me.  As for the tops, they are comfortable, hide bra straps well and even have a little extra fabric to disguise a bit of tummy.  the colors are bright and as hoped for.  Just took away a star for loss of trust.
This shirt fit great 5 ft 150 lbs and large was perfect.  The material is lightweight but not see through.  It stays in place while you work out.
Better than I expected in quality, sizing and style. Already looking for the next shirt!

This is for the racerback style that is 66.7% Polyester 29.5% Lyocell 3.8% Spandex. I also own the other version too and do not really like those so much ( different materials). I have bought multiple of the racerbacks in different colors and bought more when needed different size. I now wear a small and fits great (form fitted) but could do medium if did not want fitted look. I wish Baleaf made shirts with sleeves (both short and long) in the same materials. Now that colder weather is coming in my area I need sleeves.

评论概述: Purple different than pictured; Size up unless you want extremely fitted.
评论详情: Not the pretty eggplant purple shown in the listing, but definitely purple.  Sizing up to a medium to allow for more of a breeze and out of modesty.  I’m 34C, 125 lbs., 5’6’ and find that sizing up from the size chart for Baleaf tops (of which I own at least 10 for their breathability, and they even hold up well through a hot machine wash and tumble dry at the low setting, even after two years) does allow for much more breathable comfort.

I would really like to say I like these…the quality is nice and the fit in general. The fabric was not see thru, soft feel, and hang well. However, I do not like shirts that come up around my neckline.  I prefer a little scoop or most preferably a v-neck.  I like the Baleaf brand, but had to return this; it was uncomfortable for me.
I have this in so many colors. It is great for exercising or vacationing to hot climates. The material keeps moisture away. The one downside I think the neck gets a little stretched out looking.

Ordered this top twice.  The first time a size L was recommended,  so that's what I ordered. This shirt is cut for a fit body. It hugs my torso more than I care for. Reordered in XL. Lovely shirt and color.
Finally, a shirt that fits.  Nice fabric.  Nice shape.  Photo is very accurate.

I bought this in four colors. Looking for sleeveless exercise wear to play pickleball in. Met all the criteria, especially because it is not a v neck. The only thing missing is a breathable material. I would rather pay more and have a breathable material

评论概述: Not as long as the picture shows
评论详情: This top is good for working out. It's light weight. The neckline is just what I was looking for, covers the cleavage when I bend over. The top looked like it almost fully covered her bottom but it doesn't. I was going off of the picture (yes, I know better). The XL is not that long, it hits the top of my butt, right about where the sacrum is. It still works for me but I was a little disappointed.
Product runs a little small

The color, fabric, and quality are all great. If you want a looser fit like us shown in the pic, you should order one size up. I should have ordered a medium. The small fits, it just looks much more fitted.
too tight for my comfort. I returned and ordered a larger size. I normally wear XL but had to order XXL

These tank tops are not bad for the price. I like the color, very pretty color purple. It fits comfortably, I am usually a large but got an XL so it's a little loose for work. Doesn't wrinkle so far, decent quality. Not too breathable as it kind of holds in the heat.

I am updating my first review.  I ordered the dusty purple racer back in a medium.  I’m 5’3” 133lbs and wear a 34C.  The arm holes were gaping around my chest, but I chose to keep it.  After one wash/dry they shrank up and the shirt fits me great.  It’s not too snug or clingy despite the armhole shrinkage.  I ordered it in two other colors and my only complaint is these are not sweat wicking.  I sweat quite a bit when working out and in these shirts, everyone knows it!  The black is the most forgiving in that area.

I am not a fan of  most Baleaf athletic wear for women BUT that being said, I do like this top and I have bought several.  I don't know that they are true moisture wicking - my experience over decades of working out is that 99% of the tops that say they are wicking, come up short.  But this top in a relaxed fit is cool and comfortable to wear.  I wash on delicate cycle and that works just fine.  Sizing - I usually go one size up on workout tops just because I want them to be relaxed and fall away from my torso so in this top, I select Large although I would be a Medium based on the chart.

I bought one shirt to try on and see how I liked it. Well I loved it so much I ended up buying 3 more in different colors. I think the price was on point for the product, the quality seems decent, it’s pretty comfortable to wear, and I like how it fits on me.
Runs on the slim side
Nice length , would prefer a blend with cotton.
Cute but whenever I wear them in the heat at practice they really pointed out my sweat, the tank’s material for sweat isn’t all good
XL a little “roomy” because bottom of shirt is slightly flared. Love the color and material feel.
Frankly I was leery this was so cheap but it feels very soft and is very comfortable for exercise.
Bought this for my daughter. Love the color and the fabric. Wears well, washes well.
Nice shirt to wear to work out.  Launders well but is prone to wrinkle if left sitting in the washer or dryer. I love the color.
Very comfortable and not to large in armhole area.

The is the softest workout top. It fits well and the sizing is TTS. I ordered the white and it’s not see through at all. Even when sweating, you don’t have to worry. I would recommend air drying as I never dry any of my athletic wear.
I have purchased 3 of these, and they are my favorite! Lightweight, quality material, moisture wicking, fits true to size, and looks great! Highly recommend
I thought it would be lighter color
Love these shirts and have both it in several colors. True to size and breathable.

Material is nice. I was up in the air if I should buy a medium or large, I ended up buying 2 larges and 1 medium and I personally like how  the large fits me a little bit better. The medium was a little too snug for my taste, but it did fit with a little bit of wiggle room. For reference I am 5’1”, 151lbs, 34DD, and I prefer my clothing a bit loose since I carry weight in my tummy.
This fabric is lightweight and breathable. The shirts pack nicely and take up almost no space. I got them in three different colors.

评论概述: Please remove logo on the back
评论详情: This tank top was everything I was looking for but I have one big issue with it.  The logo on the back is so prominent and unnecessary.  I am considering whether to return it but have been looking for ways to remove the logo without damaging the material.  Please consider making the tank top without a logo on the back.  If you do, I'd buy every color!

This light weight tank keeps me cool. I love that the arm pit area is not low. The length is perfect for lots of movement on the court. Washes well. I put mine in the dryer for a couple minutes to release wrinkles and hang too dry.
i love  this!! lightweight not to low in front
Beautiful pink color, perfect pickleball shirt.  Love the length, great for covering up body imperfections

评论概述: Odd fit for a great blue
评论详情: I bought this to replace a beloved blue workout top. The heather blue is ideal for the job. I’m inconsistent in baleaf clothing, wearing a xs or s. I’m 5’3” , 112 lbs, and 32D.  I did not want the top to cling to me like the buff model you see online, so I bought the small. The small hangs nicely in the front without pulling across the chest. However, the cut under the arms, and how it meets up in the center of the back is way to generous, even to account for perhaps it being a bigger size on me. At least an inch and a half of my sports bra can be seen under my arms through where the fabric comes up in the middle of my back. It’s a look. I’m not going to return it because I don’t want it to be tight across the chest in an extra small. But if I didn’t love the blue, I’d return it and keep searching.

Good choice if you want to go sleeveless without worrying about cleavage during a run. The neckline is high enough to cover your chest without choking you. Fabric is lightweight, quick drying, and withstands frequent washing.
True to size. Comfortable  Good summers
Very soft. I had purchased this in white too but I could see my bra through the arm hole. I can with this lovely color but have decided to use a sports bra. Otherwise a great fit.
Loved the material.  It fit perfectly, and the arm hole was not too big!
This has a nice fit. Smooth fabric and such a great color. Stays free of wrinkles, but I hang up my clothes like this wet. Just the kind of cut that I wanted. I want more!

I purchased this tank for the length and am pleased that it covers nearly all of my backside and crotch area (see photos). The material is lightweight and smooth, the arm holes  allow freedom of movement but are not so big that my bra shows. I would’ve given this sports tank 5 stars except that it runs a bit smaller than most large tops do for me. I am a chunky 5’4”, 155 lbs, 36C lady, and usually a large isn’t clingy through my chest and back. This one is a little but I would guess that an XL would be way too loose. I do not feel uncomfortable with the way it fits, however. I still have full range of motion and do not feel like I look immodest or like I’m trying to draw attention to my chest!
I like the way it fit. And it was very very comfortable and it doesn’t wrinkle.
Nice fit bought a large love these shirts the gray one is a little heavier material wish they where all that

评论概述: Good workout shirt. Too bad I ordered the wrong size
评论详情: Not sure how I screwed this up, but I ordered a large instead of a medium. I will probably just keep the large for kicking around the house. But I will definitely be ordering a Medium for running

Color matches the photo. Good quality fabric. Shape matches the picture. Will be a good workout shirt. Doesn't bunch, but fits nicely. Should feel cool in warmer temperatures. Looks nice and could be worn as an every day shirt as well as a workout shirt.
Watched for awhile, price came down.  Happy with purchase.
I have purchased several of these tops in 6 different colors, love them very few wrinkles when you remove promptly from the dryer, the colors are very nice.

I've had good luck with every Baleaf women's clothing item I've ever ordered, so I tried this sleeveless tank when I was looking for another good sweat wicking work out top. I wear this to run and lift weights all the time and it's very comfortable. Fits true to size, although it is a bit on the long side (I'm only just over 5 ft. tall, though). Comfortable and looks great, even though it's already been washed quite a bit.
I am 5’4, 135 lbs and I got a small. It fits well and armpit holes are regular size and do not hang down.
Have been using this tank top for my daily bike rides.  I am 5’7” and 145 lb and the large fits very well.  Will be buying a few more.

评论概述: Material light weight for summer. Perfect fit
评论详情: I loved the material. Great for working out, for summertime wear. Fit perfectly. Bought a couple of these
Took long time to get them. Still haven’t received 2 of the ones I ordered.

These shirts are pretty much all I wear in the summer. The cut is perfect … I am short but these are not too long. I appreciate that they are not racerback, which most workout gear is. They hold up well in the wash and are great for sweaty days. Have multiple colors and wish you offered more bright colors!
Like the neckline.  Armholes are good size to cover bra. Good coverage of backside.

I bought a handful of these as I wanted something without sleeves but not a racer back or tank top. I do think they run a tad small but still love them. They don’t gap in the armpits and length is prefect.  For reference I’m just under 5’4” and weigh 175 with muffin top. Purchased Large.
Love the color fit and bottom hem
I like that there is no under arm gaps. It does seem to be a little longer than most tanks. Good if wearing leggings but too long for shorts.

This top is very comfortable for working out or lounging at home. It fits true to size--I'm a Size 16ish (Bra Size 42G) and ordered an XL and it is a perfect fit. The armholes cover my bra and are long enough for me to wear tucked or untucked at 5'2. They washed and dried very nicely and I'm probably going to order more because I'm so pleased with the quailty.

I purchased this specifically for yoga because I wanted something sleeveless that didn't ride up. I couldn't believe it, but I've used it twice for yoga and I've never had to tug at it to try and cover my skin. LOVE it!  The only negative thing I can say is that it doesn't come in petites, so it is long on me. I wish they'd make it a little shorter for we short women. Otherwise, it's terrific!
Great material for workout, or any sports.
Really like this top - ordered a large so it would fit a little looser and it was perfect.  not too short as a lot of the tops seem to be now.

I just purchased two of these; one in raspberry and the other in white.  They are well-made, wash well, and are flattering to my size 12 body.  I may purchase the coral one next.  I am a big fan of Baleaf and own several pairs of the long work-out pants as well.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: Good comfortable fit; love these tops for sports
评论详情: I prefer looser fit so large works best for me. 5’5”, 140 lbs.,  broad shoulders.

I love this brand and have numerous shirts in sleeveless, short sleeves and long sleeves, all in large. But I have to say the tank tops run a little big in comparison. There's definitely a slight gap around the arm/armpit area. If I buy any more tank tops, I will size down.
Great color & quality.  Will definitely buy this brand again.
I love this brand and have purchased shorts, tees and a romper. I will continue to look for more items for the fall season, as well!
This shirt is perfect for working outside on the heat. So breathable, comfortable,  and lose enough feeling.  I wish it was a little cheaper so I could buy more for work and home life.  5*
I wear these for an outdoor job.  Quick to dry but wish they were more breathable.Fitted but not clingy.  Long enough to cover my butt.  Overall would recommend

评论概述: Fabric really sticks to areas you'd least want
评论详情: Usually like Baleaf products but the fabric on this tank is 100% unforgiving.  Good top if you're under 20% body fat with 6-pack abs or wanting to showcase a baby bump.  Otherwise, no.  Just no.
Purchase two of these for Pickleball. Nice little top for the price. Also, you can wear them with a pair of jeans or shorts. Would purchase again.
I was looking for a sleeveless top to wear to pilates. This fit the bill. It's plenty long enough. Like the fabric and it was very quick getting to me.

I've previously ordered this top, in a Medium, and it's perfect. Longish, loose and a little drape of the silky material. I'm 5'8" and a US size 10. This top - the Medium Grey, is more fitted, the fabric is thicker and stiffer and it's a bit shorter than the original one I purchased too. If you're at the top end of the sizing maybe try the next size up if you're looking for looser fit.
Great fit, and excellent breathability
I love the racerback style, please make it in more colors!

I love these tops so much I’ve bought four. I’ll buy more when they have other colors available in my size. They are soft and comfortable, and fit perfectly. For reference, I’m barely  5’ tall, 105 lbs, 34” bust, with a bit of a gut. Lol (I wish more reviewers would include such information.) The XS was a perfect fit. Long enough I can wear them with leggings and a slightly loose fit that isn’t tight around my belly. Underarms are not too big, which I find is often a problem. It’s probably gross to post a picture on my armpit but I wanted to highlight that part.

These tank tops are great for jogging and long distance hikes. I like how quickly they dry out on the trail, and they’re lightweight. These tank tops are extremely comfortable to wear when it’s hot outside.

Edited: Customer service with this tee was great. I really just wanted to return it because of my original post but they exchanged and sent me another. The 2nd arrived very quickly (next day), no horrible smell and it is a great workout or casual tank. I will be using it while backpacking, which the material is very light and flowy. A little tighter in the chest so size up if you debate between 2 sizes because of your bust alone.  Original: Not sure where this shirt has been before I ordered it but it had the worst smell. A very strong cheap floral smell. Tags were still on and no marks or anything in the shirt but I had to put it in a ziplock to keep my kitchen from smelling.

I love this top!  It is lightweight and comfortable.The arm opening is not snug but lays well against my arm so good coverage in a sleeveless top.  I also like that it is longer and does not ride up during a work out.  I liked the first one so well, I ordered 3 more colors.

Overall, I'm happy with it.  The sizing and fit are OK, but the color is way off! I ordered the lavender, and it's way deeper purple, which isn't ideal since I was looking for lighter color for summer heat!
Racerback style has enormous armholes. Not a fan. The sleeveless top is nice and true to size.
This a light weight dry fit shirt. It has great coverage and stays in place. This is my got to top for lifting and cardio.
Great / True Fit.
I wear for walking exercise and daily wear. For me it runs a size small. I’m 5’7” 165# and order an XL. I have 3 colors. Love them all.
These shirts are well proportioned and durable. The lightweight fabric is ideal. All around excellent.
Stays in place
Perfect for working out. Runs true to size .
